channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:44 Auxiliary alarm in Zvenigorod district.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 游릭 04:44 Auxiliary alarm in Zvenigorod district.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 02:50 PM Anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region.
